summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3962 for the improvement of Whitman Avenue, from North 41st Street to North 46th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48250 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
